label: 道
説明文: Also called michi; an administrative grouping of provinces under the ritsuryō system; there were seven dō (called circuits in the text), each named for a major travel route originating in the capital and passing through each of the provines in the circuit: the Tōkaidō, Tōsandō, Hokurikudō, San'yōdō, Nankaidō, and Saikaidō, plus the capital region (kinai). [律令、東海道、東山道、北陸道、山陽道、南海道、西海道、畿内] [HW]
